hadiths.text: Ibn Umar reported that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) prescribed Zakat-ul-Fitr of Ramadan one sa' of dates or one sa' of barley for every individual among the Muslims (whether) free man or slave, male or female, young or old

chapter.ara-name: باب زَكَاةِ الْفِطْرِ عَلَى الْمُسْلِمِينَ مِنَ التَّمْرِ وَالشَّعِيرِ
chapter.eng-name: Zakat Al-Fitr is due from the muslims in the form of dates and barley
